text: @realDonaldTrump Mr. President, Jerrod Kushner  is hurting You very badly!  He is a Progressive and he is your worst enemy!  You have fallen for the Covid-19 prank!  You have failed designating ANTIFA a Terrorist Orginization!  We The People and Patriots are tired of waiting for Indictments!!!
